TutorialDescriptionTooltips.Description: Def: How much damage this zombie can take.
Atk: How much damage this zombie deals.
Gloop's defense was lowered by the counter-attack.

TutorialAvatar.Description:
Welcome, zombie slayer! 

 Since you're new around here, I'll let you borrow my deck while you learn the ropes.
Destroy the enemy overlord to win!

OverlordSayTooltips.Description: My minion cannot attack yet. So I'm done for now.
Not bad for a slab of rock.
I'm done. Let's move on, shall we?

TutorialAvatar.Description:
NOICE!
You won your first match!

TutorialActivityActionHandlerData.Description: I can still play a card!
My minion is itching for battle!
An Item. Didn't know you were smart enough to play those...
What are you waiting for? Finish him!

TutorialDescriptionTooltips.Description: Add cards to your deck by dragging them to the top.
Remove cards from your deck by double tapping on them.
You can also add cards by double tapping them.
It's time to BATTLE!
Select this text to rename your Deck.
Click on the arrows to browse your cards.
Don't you want to open your new cards first?
Open your pack.
Feral zombies can attack the turn they are played.
This is how much goo your card costs.
You've earned a goo bottle.
You've earned another goo bottle, and goo you spent before is replenished.
Entry effects happen as you play cards, just like Items.
Heavy zombies need to be attacked first.
Overlords have unique abilities that can be used on cooldown.

TutorialAvatar.Description: Zombies aren't all just claws and flesh. They have abilities too! Let's learn how to use them...

OverlordSayTooltips.Description: Not if I defeat you first!
We're done here, let's move it on!
My Poison Dart will end him.

TutorialActivityActionHandlerData.Description: No, not that! We can end it this turn!

TutorialDescriptionTooltips.Description: Don't you want to open your new cards first?

TutorialActivityActionHandlerData.Description: Best to play Goozilla first. Youll see.
What are you doing? We can end this.

TutorialDescriptionTooltips.Description: For Toxic, the Rank Buff gives zombies +1 Atk and the Destroy ability.
When higher ranked zombies are played, they give Rank Buffs to lower ranking zombies from the same faction.
Zombies damaged by zombies with Destroy are removed from the battleground.
Zombies with Blitz can attack other zombies the turn they are played.

TutorialAvatar.Description:
Zombies also have ranks, which give buffs to other zombies.

Come, I'll show you how it works...

OverlordSayTooltips.Description: We'll show them with our GooZilla!

TutorialDescriptionTooltips.Description: Death effects are triggered when the zombie is destroyed.
Gives you the ability to Overflow your goo.
Overflow allows you to go beyond 11 goo and play stronger zombies.

TutorialAvatar.Description:
Let's learn about Goo-Carriers.

These special cards give you extra goo to spend in the same turn. This effect is called "Overflow".

OverlordSayTooltips.Description: Let's play Cherno-bill. But we need Overflow first. Use Tainted Goo.

TutorialDescriptionTooltips.Description: You go first.
This is your starting hand. Drag cards you want replaced to the top, then press KEEP
You still have a battle to win.

TutorialAvatar.Description:
This time it's all up to you...

Use everything you've learned and make me proud!

There's nothing more I can teach you. Congratulations!

Now you can take your skills online by challenging other players in VS mode.
